'''''Other Hands'' 10/11''' is an issue of ''[[Other Hands]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing|MERP]]''.

* '''Published:''' November [[1995]]

==Contents==
*Editorial: Spreading the Word - [[Chris Seeman]]
*Communications - Nathan Smith, Bernie Roessler, Jason Vester, Wesley Frank
*Frontlines - [[Chris Seeman]]
*Digital Hands - Fredrik Ekman
*The Streets of Minas Tirith - Bernie Roessler
*Some brief thoughts on magic in Middle-earth - Dirk Brandherm
*The Power of Spells in Middle-earth - Wesley Frank
*Scenario: The High Cost of Living - Magnus Seter
*All That Glitters - [[Anders Blixt]]
*An Interview with Laurie Battle - [[Chris Seeman]]
*Map of Forochel - Wesley Frank
*Product Review: Middle-earth: The Wizards - [[Chris Seeman]]
*Product Review: The Shire - Michael Bailey
*Product Review: Lake-town - Gerrit Nuckton
*Product Review: Rolemaster Standard Rules - Sam Daish
*Herbs & Spells - Torquil Gault
